extension.summary: HDMI Input PVR Client for HY300 Projector
extension.description:
PVR client that presents HDMI input from the HY300 projector's TV capture hardware as a live TV channel in Kodi. Enables seamless switching between media content and external HDMI devices using the projector's remote control.
Features: - HDMI input as Live TV channel - Hot-plug detection and status monitoring - Multi-format input support (720p/1080p @ 30/60fps) - Audio/video synchronization - Integration with V4L2 capture driver
extension.disclaimer: This addon requires the HY300 HDMI input driver and V4L2 device (/dev/video0). Hardware functionality depends on proper kernel module installation.
extension.news: v1.0.0: - Initial release - Basic HDMI input channel support - V4L2 capture integration - Signal status monitoring
